page.title: 09PORTHMADOG LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: Up to the reorganisation of local government in 1972,the estuary was the county boundary and it remains the electoral boundary.West of the estuary is Arfon constituency,its MP being Mr. Dafydd Wigley,Plaid Cymru.East of the estuary is the Meirionnydd Nant Conwy constituency, its MP being Mr.Dafydd Elis Thomas,Plaid Cymru. The following national government departments have offices in the town: Health and Social Security,Manpower Services Commision,Jobcentre,Inland Revenue,Customs and Excise,County Court.There are local offices of Gwynedd County Council and Dwyfor District Council. Porthmadog Community Council has responsibilities for observations on planning,local amenities,tourism. Penrhyndeudraeth Comunity Council is responsible for the area east of the estuary.
